rfps.title: Supply of Control and Communications Grade Copper Cables
rfps.source_reference: REQUEST FOR PROPOSAL (RFP) FOR SUPPLY OF COPPER CABLES

scope_of_supply.description: PTFE Insulated Equipment Wire 16 AWG (10 colours, 4 rolls of 100 m each per colour)
PTFE Insulated Equipment Wire 20 AWG (10 colours, 4 rolls of 100 m each per colour)
PTFE Insulated Equipment Wire 24 AWG (10 colours, 4 rolls of 100 m each per colour)

testing_requirements_summary: Pre-delivery inspection at vendor works with electrical and mechanical tests as per Acceptance Test Plan.
HV tests between cores and between core and shield.
Insulation resistance checks and spark tests during production.
Warranty 12 months from commissioning or 18 months from dispatch.

rfps.title: Supply of HT Cables at GSECL, Ukai TPS
rfps.source_reference: Tender for Supply of HT cable at GSECL, UTPS, ET-5919

scope_of_supply.description: Aluminium Cable 1 Core x 1000 sqmm HT
Aluminium Cable 3 Core x 185 sqmm HT
Aluminium Cable 3 Core x 240 sqmm XLPE 11 kV HT
3C x 50 sqmm 11kV(E) Grade HT XLPE Insulated Fixed Al Cable
1C x 50 sqmm 11kV(E) Grade HT XLPE Insulated Fixed Al Cable

testing_requirements_summary: Type tests as per IS 1554, IS 7098 and IS 9968 including dielectric, thermal, mechanical tests and flammability.
Acceptance tests for each lot: conductor tests, dimensional checks, insulation & sheath tests, HV and insulation resistance tests.
Routine tests for every drum: conductor resistance, HV test, armour resistance, partial discharge for XLPE cables.
Cables to bear ISI mark and be suitable for underground/trench installation in hot, humid, polluted conditions.
